articles.title: Macy's is selling a Yves Saint Laurent perfume set for only $92
articles.mainIdea: Macy's is selling a Yves Saint Laurent perfume set for only $92
articles.summary: TheStreet: Macy's is selling a Yves Saint Laurent perfume set for only $92. Shoppers get "loads of compliments" when they wear it.

articles.title: 3 S&P 500 Stocks We Approach with Caution
articles.mainIdea: 3 S&P 500 Stocks We Approach with Caution
articles.summary: StockStory: 3 S&P 500 Stocks We Approach with Caution. The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors. Related tickers mentioned: HD, HPE, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Dan Ives says this tech stock is under the most pressure in AI era
articles.mainIdea: Dan Ives says this tech stock is under the most pressure in AI era
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: Dan Ives says this tech stock is under the most pressure in AI era. Dan Ives, Wedbush's managing director and global head of technology research, says Adobe (ADBE) is "under the most pressure" to adapt amid the AI boom. Ives explains why and shares what most surprised him about the AI trade in 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief. Related tickers mentioned: CRM, ORCL.
